mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERPASS ( USER_ID, REG_NO, COM_NO, ORG_CD, EMP_NO, NM_KOR, STATE_FLAG, ORG_FLAG, LEVEL_CD, KIND_CD, TYPE_CD, GRADE_CD, LANG_KND, THEME_ID, MAIL_FLAG, BLOG_FLAG, MEMO_FLAG, DISK_FLAG, CHAT_FLAG, RCMD_USER_ID, MILE_TOT, NM_CHR, NM_ENG, NM_NIC, SEX_FLAG, BLOOD_TYPE, HOME_TEL, OFFC_TEL, MOBILE_TEL, FAX_NO, BIRTH_YMD, LUORSUN_FLAG, MARRY_YMD, EMAIL_ADDR, OPEN_FLAG, HOME_ZIP, HOME_ADDR1, HOME_ADDR2, OFFC_ZIP, OFFC_ADDR1, OFFC_ADDR2, USER_ICON, USER_INFO01, USER_INFO02, USER_INFO03, USER_INFO04, USER_INFO05, USER_INFO06, USER_INFO07, USER_INFO08, USER_INFO09, USER_INFO10, LAST_LOGON, LAST_IP, REG_DATIM, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DATIM,PAGE1ST_FLAG,PAGE1ST_URL,PIC_PATH,INTRO,UPDATE_REQUIRED,PHONE_TYPE, DEVICE_ID,PUSH_TOKEN ) VALUES ( #userId, #regNo#, #comNo#, #orgCd#, #empNo#, #nmKor#, #stateFlag#, #orgFlag#, #levelCd#, #kindCd#, #typeCd#, #gradeCd#, #langKnd#, #themeId#, #mailFlag#, #blogFlag#, #memoFlag#, #diskFlag#, #chatFlag#, #rcmdUserId#, #mileTot#, #nmChr#, #nmEng#, #nmNic#, #sexFlag#, #bloodType#, #homeTel#, #offcTel#, #mobileTel#, #faxNo#, #birthYmd#, #luorsunFlag#, #marryYmd#, #emailAddr#, #openFlag#, #homeZip#, #homeAddr1#, #homeAddr2#, #offcZip#,#offcAddr1#, #offcAddr2#, #userIcon#, #userInfo01#, #userInfo02#, #userInfo03#, #userInfo04#, #userInfo05#, #userInfo06#, #userInfo07#, #userInfo08#, #userInfo09#, #userInfo10#, #lastLogon#, #lastIp#, #regDatim#, #updUserId#, #updDatim#, #page1stFlag#, #page1stUrl#, #picPath#, #intro#, #updateRequired#, #phoneType#, #deviceId#, #pushToken# )
